changeSet.author: abhijeet.hambir
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE [ViWeb].[GetVIwebAccessToken] @key varchar(100) AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; select [value] from ViWeb.ViwebAccessToken where [key]=@key END
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON ViWeb.GetVIwebAccessToken TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON ViWeb.GetVIwebAccessToken FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE ViWeb.GetVIwebAccessToken;
